meanings.definition: To pledge or contribute money to a cause or organization.
meanings.sent1: I will subscribe to the charity to help children in need.
meanings.sent2: Many people subscribe to their favorite charity every month.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally subscribed to donate my allowance to the school's fundraiser.
meanings.sent4: Her heart subscribes to the idea of giving back to the community.
meanings.sent5: Subscribing to the cause of animal welfare brings joy to many.

meanings.definition: To agree to receive a publication or service regularly.
meanings.sent1: I want to subscribe to the magazine for fashion tips.
meanings.sent2: She subscribes to a weekly newsletter about healthy living.
meanings.sent3: My cat seems to subscribe to the daily delivery of treats.
meanings.sent4: His mind subscribes to the idea of learning something new every day.
meanings.sent5: Subscribing to the newspaper keeps her informed about current events.

meanings.definition: To believe in or support a particular idea or theory.
meanings.sent1: I subscribe to the notion that kindness can change the world.
meanings.sent2: Many scientists subscribe to the theory of evolution.
meanings.sent3: His dog seems to subscribe to the belief that all food is for sharing.
meanings.sent4: Her soul subscribes to the idea of spreading love and positivity.
meanings.sent5: Subscribing to the concept of equality is essential for a just society.
